title: 72 hours at Camp David: Inside Biden's lagging response to the fall of Afghanistan
content:
1. 72 hours at Camp David: Inside Biden's lagging response to the fall of Afghanistan  The Washington Post
  2. Watch CBS This Morning: Eye Opener: Biden defends leaving Afghanistan - Full show on CBS  cbs.com
  3. Biden speech on Afghanistan: defends withdrawal, blames Afghan government for Taliban takeover  Reuters
  4. NBC's Chuck Todd on Biden's Afghan withdrawal: It would have been 'just as bad, if not worse' under Trump  Fox News
  5. 5 takeaways from Biden's Afghanistan speech  Los Angeles Times
